meanings.definition: To direct or point in a specific direction.
meanings.sent1: She airted the lost hiker towards the trail.
meanings.sent2: Please airt the spotlight towards the stage.
meanings.sent3: The confused cat airted its attention to the dangling toy.
meanings.sent4: His finger airted like a compass needle towards the North Star.
meanings.sent5: The traffic officer airted the cars with precise hand signals.

meanings.definition: A direction or quarter, especially in Scottish dialect.
meanings.sent1: The sun set in the westerly airt.
meanings.sent2: He walked towards the northern airt of the town.
meanings.sent3: The treasure map pointed to the hidden chest in the southerly airt.
meanings.sent4: She always felt a pull towards the easterly airt of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The wind blew from the western airt, carrying the scent of pine trees.
